hiveArticle.title: Few Pictures of my recent Yercaud Travel
hiveArticle.body:
I have traveled to Yercaud from Bangalore by my awesome Bike. The journey was around 215 kms approximately. We have started at 5 AM in the morning and reached Yercaud at 12 PM. The journey was peaceful and you will see a lot of greenery around.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSXavW722C9n6vd7krsXSCGJkJsBNVtoenjwsy6JRiZHa/image.png)

**The journey started Early Morning at 5AM**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQ61hDNvwiv9SpQCw4pDeYk1iJLaLFXJtHVgrmKvNHCar/image.png)

**Awesome hills while traveling through the roads.**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVys4PTqUyUCtN27bkWEB9PDFUrqEfwgwMnzvvPnRBvJ9/image.png)

**Looking down while going Uphill**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRmfmMEoB3jofbJXpb9BaCXPKFkzLK1ijiqTTbAAGtWZf/image.png)

**When the weather supports your travel. Fog all around.**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmcMn4KY38ueTpJtZEnxvjMv8Ak89VdEFNfbFmzepTpNJz/image.png)

**Some greenery which is only be seen in the Hill station**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQme79HSpCj2V5iaazTGkmz7PPunSYqtZ74bodzyUW4JCoC/image.png)
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdqYQ1nmtttPEfqHf1pyjjDTviYpbq6RoapkpoKEDFYwb/image.png)

**Ohh you do get to see the waterfall, and people enjoy it a lot.**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmeZQTnUUzihkrxykFdRA6W8xJUctDKJLyvMT24FGaUe8E/image.png)
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTBnG1b2nyb1zfw7GK4aVbTETfc5FYB9RH9jxuvGndFJk/image.png)

**Have to do boating, its mandatory**

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUdrGFX5Z85V7SUGGki6RVGhCZsvPa9y2xCjzZy1ThKTk/image.png)
